accuracy.description: The accuracy of the solution, considering whether the solution is mathematically correct and complete.

conciseness.description: Assessing how concisely the solution is presented, avoiding unnecessary explanation or complexity.

clarity.description: Evaluating how clearly the solution's steps and explanations are presented.

efficiency.description: Assessing the efficiency of the algorithm or approach used to solve the problem.

structuring.description: Evaluating how well-structured and organized the solution is.
